Package org.apache.sis.util

Annotation Type Configuration

@Documented @Target(METHOD) @Retention(SOURCE) public @interface Configuration
Annotates methods having a system-wide impact on the configuration of the Apache SIS library. See "Use" javadoc link for a list of annotated methods.

Do not use. This annotation is for documentation purpose only and will be replaced by the Configuration class.

Since:
0.3
See Also:
  • SIS-86

Defined in the sis-utility module
